I downloaded this, no game. Just a virus

true, the game is valid, but the keygen is a virus, and it also refers to keygen.us which is also some kind of virus.
DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS!
You should be shot in the head, get a life with that virus BS. Like the first comment said, it is the right installation for the game, but the "keygen" is a virus.

this is nice game but sadly pc get virus warning by norton anti-virus 2009 has been blocked W32.IRCBot high virus. pls. before tried then write down your comment that you can help to other one. uploader did not say anything about that ? he/she should responsible.

You guys do realize that when you are downloading/installing a torrent that it's normal (and usually expected) that when you download things like a keylogger or a key generator that any anti-virus program that's worth anything will tell you that these things are viruses right? 

This download works perfectly. A bit more information should've been given as to how you locate the product code to put into the keygen, but other than that, it's 100% good. Thanks nystrand.
Yeah, the game install is fine and clean, but the keygen is a virus. Don't run the keygen. And get fucked for that virus, nystrand.

Here's my upload of the game + keygen (that works perfectly, ofc :)
